generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Raleway&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Ubuntu:wght@400;500;700&display=swap");*{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}body,html{font-family:Ubuntu,sans-serif}#app,body,html{width:100%;height:100%}#app{display:flex;flex-direction:column}#navbar{flex-basis:6%;background:#53c1e9;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}#content{flex-basis:94%;display:flex;flex-direction:row;height:100vh}.sidebar{flex-basis:20%;background:#d9e7f2}.sidebar-item{width:100%;padding:10px 20px;font-weight:700;color:rgb(0,0,0,45%);transition:background .25s ease-in-out;cursor:pointer}.sidebar-item:hover{background:#fff}#today{margin-top:2em}.add-icon{margin-right:5px}.add-icon,.add-icon:before{width:15px;height:2px;background:rgb(0,0,0,45%)}.add-icon:before{content:"";display:block;z-index:0;transform:rotate(90deg);transform-origin:center}#add-project{display:flex;align-items:center;padding-left:35px;font-size:.9em}#user-btn{margin-right:1.2em;padding:10px;color:#fff;font-weight:700}#user-btn div{margin-left:10px;cursor:pointer}.hamburger-menu{position:relative;width:25px;height:25px;margin-left:20px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.hamburger-menu div{width:20px;height:2px;background:#fff}.hamburger-menu div:after,.hamburger-menu div:before{content:"";position:absolute;width:20px;height:2px;background:#fff}.hamburger-menu div:before{transform:translateY(6px)}.hamburger-menu div:after{transform:translateY(-6px)}.loading-screen{z-index:9;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;right:0;display:none;background:#fff}.loading-image{z-index:10;position:absolute;width:min(200px,50%);height:auto;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);display:none}.overlay{top:0;left:0;bottom:0;right:0;z-index:6;background:rgb(0,0,0,70%)}.modal-menu,.overlay{position:fixed;display:none}.modal-menu{width:450px;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);flex-direction:column;z-index:7;background:#fff}.menu-header{flex-basis:30px;display:flex;align-items:center;height:30px;padding:10px;background:#55c0e9}.menu-title{color:#fff;font-weight:700}.modal-form{position:relative;z-index:8;flex-basis:90%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;padding:10px 20px}.auth-error{width:80%;margin:10px auto;padding:10px;background:#eaa8a8;color:#a22727;font-size:small;text-align:center}label{margin-top:15px;color:#55c0e9;font-weight:700}input,textarea{margin-top:10px;padding:10px;color:rgb(0,0,0,50%);font-size:large}.radio-group{display:flex;align-items:center;margin-top:20px}.radio-group input,.radio-group label{display:block}.radio-group input{-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;appearance:none;margin:0;transform:scale(.75);border:5px solid rgb(0,0,0,40%);border-radius:50%}.radio-group input:first-of-type{background:rgb(0,255,0,90%)}.radio-group input:nth-of-type(2){background:rgb(255,255,0,90%)}.radio-group input:nth-of-type(3){background:rgb(255,0,0,90%)}.radio-group input:checked{border:5px solid #53c1e9}.radio-group label{margin:0 15px 0 3px}.radio-group-prompt{margin-top:15px;padding:0;color:#55c0e9;font-weight:700}.form-buttons{margin-top:40px;display:flex;justify-content:flex-end;align-items:center}.cancel,.submit{margin:0 5px 15px;width:80px;height:30px;border:1px solid #a5def3}.submit{background:#53c1e9;color:#fff}.cancel{color:#53c1e9}#project-container{flex-basis:80%;padding:2em 5em;display:flex;flex-direction:column;background:#fafafa}#project-topbar{width:80%;display:flex;align-items:center;font-weight:700;color:rgb(0,0,0,45%)}#topbar-title{margin-right:.4em;font-size:1.4em}#topbar-date{padding-top:.5em;font-size:.8em}.add-task{width:70px;height:25px;margin-top:1.5em;padding:.1em;display:flex;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:center;box-sizing:content-box;border:.1em solid rgb(85,192,233,50%);transition:background .15s ease-in-out;cursor:pointer}.add-task-desc{font-size:.8em;font-weight:bolder;color:rgb(85,192,233,100%);pointer-events:none}.add-task-icon,.add-task-icon:before{width:15px;height:2px;background:rgb(85,192,233,100%)}.add-task-icon:before{content:"";display:block;z-index:0;transform:rotate(90deg);transform-origin:center}.add-task:hover{background:rgb(85,192,233,100%)}.add-task:hover .add-task-desc{color:#fff}.add-task:hover .add-task-icon,.add-task:hover .add-task-icon:before{background:#fff}
